snippet.title: Synovial joint
snippet.description: A synovial joint, also known as a diarthrosis, is the most common and most movable type of joint

snippet.title: synovial joint
snippet.description: synovial joint n A freely movable joint in which contiguous bony surfaces are covered by articular
